name: Dropbase
headline: Prompt-based app builder. Build back-office software faster with AI
description:
Dropbase is a prompt-based app builder that empowers developers to create custom back-office software fast and efficiently.

With Dropbase, you can build backend panels, order/billing dashboards, and internalÂ tools that can fetch data and trigger action across any database or service.

Key Features:
* Rapid development of backend panels, order/billing dashboards, and internal tools
* Seamless data fetching and action triggering across any database or service
* Intuitive prompt-based interface for streamlined app development

Dropbase customers are companies in support and operations-intensive industries such as financial services, telecom, logistics, and retail that want to:
* Dramatically reduce software development costs
* Enhance operational efficiency
* Accelerate the creation of tools to empower business teams

##### Prompt-Based App Builder
# Build Software Faster With AI
### Dropbase is a prompt-based developer platform for building web apps and automation software, fast and painless.
[Talk to Sales![Arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a486e78b25cb2_icon-chevron-right.svg)](https://dropbase.io/</request-access>)
[Deploy free version](https://dropbase.io/<https:/github.com/dropbaseHQ/dropbase>)
## Integrates with all your tools
Our custom tools and dashboards can trigger actions across all your existing tools
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d9482804ebdcd798db67_salesforce.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6400f9ebaeb0d581b82b9aee_hubspot.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d94827facdd246e06d05_salesloft.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d94805f687fdd8cce278_outreach.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d948f871be63bf07eab0_pandadoc.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d948c7ab20905f4e6f15_intercom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d94840b01665d809b38b_zendesk.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d948004e3a81a8e3d17f_aws.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d948e864de1117837043_azure.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d9484440e0c87d6e9b25_gcp.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626d948bf098ea784ea7bf8_openai.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626dafcfe00fc821012a770_anthropic.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6400f9dd14ce920c12e0191e_postgres.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6626da3aa59907680f7741d0_mysql.svg)
## How it works
Declare apps with natural language. Adjust UI via drag-and-drop.Surgically customize logic with code.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a481cdab25cc4_checkbox%20switch%20handle.svg)Declare UI, preview live](https://dropbase.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a481cdab25cc4_checkbox%20switch%20handle.svg)Drag-and-drop to adjust](https://dropbase.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a481cdab25cc4_checkbox%20switch%20handle.svg)Input behavior, get code](https://dropbase.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a481cdab25cc4_checkbox%20switch%20handle.svg)Run code with traceback](https://dropbase.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/5f2c87244e4a481cdab25cc4_checkbox%20switch%20handle.svg)Preview and launch](https://dropbase.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
##### Build UI
### Declare UI in natural language.
Dropbase AI instantiates relevant UI components.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/6673774022968225b7a34d4f_ProductHunt3.webp)
##### Adjust layout
### Drag-and-drop to adjust.
Quickly adjust UI component placement to get experience you want
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/66737a316f1167ceae05abbb_ProductHunt4.webp)
##### Generate app logic
### Describe behavior, get code.
Review, edit, and approve code. Accept changes or re-write as you see fit.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/667375b25baf6d3729c7ce39_ProductHunt2.webp)
##### Test and debug app
### Test and debug app.
Sometimes you need a custom way to handle edge cases. Run code and use traceback to debug.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/66737ce4d2726c15515ee361_ProductHunt5.webp)
##### Preview and launch app
### Preview and launch.
Preview app as it looks to end users. Your app is ready to use and share!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/66737edc79d6e7808a070943_ProductHunt6.webp)
## See it in action
##### Spend 10x less time supporting each customer
## Admin Panels
### Admin panels to automate password resets, edit access, lookup customers/orders, and update billing/subscriptions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/661db9a32c8cbfc9719637c1_admin-demo.webp)
##### Simplify the process of onboarding new users
## Approval Dashboards
### Approval dashboards help onboard new customers, review their applications and approve or reject them
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/661db9c31bcf4da98d7f01d7_approval-demo.webp)
##### Update records in your backend like a spreadsheet
## Data Editors
### Data editors let you ops teams quickly edit data about users, orders, shipments, or products with a spreadsheet interface
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/661db9dc6407f5d9eea39fd4_editor-demo.webp)
##### Restart or manage your cloud services 
## Cloud Consoles
### Cloud consoles let you monitor, restart, and manage cloud infrastructure or resources such as servers or databases
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/662700688b702f5ab19378cf_devops-hero.webp)
##### Send templated customer notifications with 1 click
## Notification Systems
### A notification system makes it easy to send email or SMS notifications to your users as a result of actions taken
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f2c87246b17fcf662282594/661db9f02bb30b3d3d77e711_email-demo.webp)
##### AI Studio.
Write, debug, and preview your apps in one place
##### UI Components.
All the essential UI components for your internal software
##### All Python. 
Write any function in Python. Get full code flexibility
##### Code generation.
Write code, AI fast. Generate, preview, and edit code
##### Lives in your codebase.
Reuse existing functions, APIs, or ORM models
##### Self-hosted, dev friendly. 
Works with your existing CI/CD and dev workflows
##### Synced State.
Client-server share state. No need to write React
##### Python libraries.
Access libraries such as numpy and pandas
##### Integrations.
Connect Postgres or any internal or external REST API

generated_description:
**Dropbase: Building Back-Office Software with AI**

Dropbase is a company that emerged in 2019, hot off the Y Combinator Batch W20, and is based in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco. At its core, Dropbase serves as a prompt-based app builder, designed to streamline the creation of custom back-office software, enabling developers to work faster and more efficiently. Imagine quickly spinning up backend panels, order dashboards, or internal toolsâall powered by AI.

### The Mission

The mission at Dropbase is clear: to empower small teams in support and operations-heavy industriesâlike financial services, telecom, logistics, and retailâto reduce software development costs dramatically while enhancing operational efficiency. With Dropbase, these companies can accelerate tool creation, enabling business teams to leverage technology where it counts.

### Key Features

- **Rapid Development**: Build backend panels and internal tools quickly with an intuitive prompt-based interface that simplifies the development process.
- **Seamless Integration**: Connect effortlessly with various databases and services, allowing for real-time data updates and action triggering.
- **Streamlined UI Customization**: Utilize a drag-and-drop feature combined with the power of natural language input to declare and adjust app interfaces.

### How It Works

Itâs straightforward. You can declare applications using everyday language, adjust the UI elements to your liking with simple drag-and-drop actions, and even edit the underlying code to fine-tune logic. Whether you're creating admin panels for managing user accounts or workflows for billing, the framework supports extensive customization.

1. **Declare UI**: Dropbase AI generates relevant UI components based on your input.
2. **Drag-and-Drop**: Position components in a way that delivers the best user experience.
3. **Behavior Logic**: Describe the desired behavior, and the tool generates code you can review and adjust.
4. **Testing**: Debug applications through an easy code execution interface, catching issues before launch.
5. **Launch**: Preview the app in real time, ensuring it meets expectations before going live.

### Target Customers

Dropbase is tailored for organizations that often grapple with high development costs and lengthy deployment times. Their clientele is largely composed of businesses with intensive operations requiring efficient and reliable internal tools.

### The Team

With a small but powerful team of just five, Dropbase embodies agility and focus. Their Group Partner, Nan, plays a vital role in propelling the company forward.

### Why It Matters

In a world where being agile determines the victor, Dropbase is essential for teams looking to leverage modern technology without the usual overhead. By focusing on developer tools enhanced with AI, they provide a foundation for companies to innovate on the backend without getting bogged down in traditional development bottlenecks.

If you're ready to transform how you build internal software, head over to [Dropbase.io](https://dropbase.io) to explore their offerings. The future of back-office software building is here, and it's powered by prompts.
